# Create Directory

[![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/joemccann/dillinger.svg?branch=master)](https://github.com/Fab993/Create_Directory)

*Dir_Create* is a python script that helps you to keep your code tidy and reproducible. It is strongly recommended to pair it with a version control system (e.g. GitHub).

### Installation

In order to install the package, open the terminal and type

```sh
$ pip install Dir_Create
```
To make sure that you have the latest realease, type

```sh
$ pip install Dir_Create --upgrade
```

### Development

Want to contribute? Great! I maintain *Dir_Create* on GitHub at this [repo](https://github.com/Fab993/Dir_Create). Pull requests are more than welcome.
### Todos

 - Test it on Windows OS
